Name: Ursa
Bio: Ulfsaar the warrior is the fiercest member of an ursine tribe, protective of his land and his people. During the long winters, while the mothers sleep and nurse their cubs, the males patrol the lands aboveâ€”as tireless, vigilant defenders of their ancient ways. Hearing dim but growing rumors of a spreading evil, Ulfsaar headed out beyond the boundaries of his wild wooded homeland, intending to track down and destroy the threat at its source, before it could endanger his people. He is a proud creature with a bright strong spirit, utterly trustworthy, a staunch ally and defender

Abilities.desc: Ursa slams the earth, causing a powerful shock to damage and slow all enemy units in a nearby area for 4 seconds.
Abilities.lore: The very steps of a male ursine shake the ground as well as the resolve of opposing warriors.

Abilities.desc: Using his skill in combat, Ursa gains increased attack speed for a number of subsequent attacks.
Abilities.notes: Overpower isn't removed by Black King Bar.
Abilities.lore: For a behemoth of his size, Ursa is deceptively nimble.

Abilities.affects:
ABILITY: Passive
DAMAGE TYPE: Physical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
Abilities.desc: Ursa's claws dig deeper wounds in the enemy, causing consecutive attacks to the same enemy to deal more damage.  If the same target is not attacked after 15 seconds, the bonus damage is lost.
Abilities.attribute:
RESET TIME: 20
RESET TIME (ROSHAN): 6
ATTACK DAMAGE PER STACK: 15/20/25/30
Abilities.lore: In nature, the wounded rarely survive the attacks of hungry predators.

Abilities.desc:
Ursa goes into a frenzy, multiplying his Fury Swipes damage and causing him to take 80% less damage. Removes any existing debuffs.
Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel
Abilities.attribute:
FURY SWIPES MULTIPLIER: 1.5 / 1.75 / 2
DAMAGE REDUCTION: 80%
DURATION: 4
SCEPTER COOLDOWN: 30 / 24 / 18
Abilities.lore: Ulfsaar succumbs to his ancient spirit, becoming the most ferocious creature on the battlefield.
